name: Knight Ville
description:
This is a demo for a game concept that I am very proud of, if you have any feed back on how I can make it better please tell me. If you want this to be a full game please support the demo. 

The art is done by these people who put up free and copyright free art - 

https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack

https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest 

https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection

https://lionheart963.itch.io/knight-sprite
